name: self-hosted-gateway
tagline: A WireGuard based gateway for securely exposing services
description: Selfhosted-gateway is a Docker-native tunneling solution that exposes local containers to the public internet via a remote WireGuard gateway. It automates reverse proxy setup with NGINX/Caddy and TLS, ideal for securely publishing homelab services.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Securely exposes local services through encrypted WireGuard VPN tunnels

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Automatically detects and configures containers with simple labels

features.title: Reverse Proxy Automation
features.description: Sets up NGINX or Caddy reverse proxies without manual configuration

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Isolates services with network segmentation and access controls
